author: makortel
body:
This PR is #15464 + era-based mechanism to enable VFP30 mitigation. Note that the era does not enable mitigation for
- HLT
- for conversions (see also discussion in #15194)

I also added a new matrix workflow (1325.4) to use the new era (`Run2_2016_HIPM`).

Tested in CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-08-22-1100. No changes expected wrt. #15464. For changes wrt. IB, see #15464. In comparison of 1325.4 in PR vs. 1325.0 in IB, differences in HLT and conversions are expected.

@rovere @VinInn
title: No vfp30 mitigation in Tracking (including customization with era)
